entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @maddow So, is that why Trump put Ivanka on the White House coronavirus task force. Because they weren't going to do anything? Or, maybe it was so she could be granted a trademark on coffins?
